channel.title: Meetup on mrnice.dev

item.title: GopherCon Israel 2024
item.description: GopherCon Israel 2024! What a fun day. Started by seeing lots of familiar faces! Miki Tebeka, Yarden Laifenfeld, Liri Sokol, Guy Brandwine, Itamar Knafo, Ran Bar-Zik and more. It’s a lot of fun knowing people and saying hi to everyone, and meeting new people, too. I arrived there and met some people from Orca Security (where I work right now). These are my raw notes from the event, not too much editing, mostly for my peeps from Orca’s Golang Guild.
